subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Nextel Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon won the pole for the Subway 500 Nextel Cup race tomorrow after qualifying yesterday at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia with a speed of 94.974 miles an hour on the 0.526-mile circuit. The pole is the 63rd of Gordon’s career.
snippet: Jeff Gordon won the pole for the Subway 500 Nextel Cup race tomorrow after qualifying yesterday at Martinsville Speedway in Virginia with a speed of 94.974 miles an hour on the 0.526-mile circuit. The pole is the 63rd of Gordon’s career.
